steps.intro: Welcome to this little tutorial. Let's begin to see how to play this game.
This is your team ! You begin with 2 characters. If they win battles, characters will level up and get stronger.
This is the life points of your team : if it comes to 0, you fail the battle.
This is the magic points of your team. You need them to use magic.
When you get damaged, this bar will rise up. When it gets full, your next attack will be overkill !
This is where the enemy will appears. To win the battle, you have to kill them before they do.
Click here to fight enemies. That simple !
During the battle, you can click as many times as you want on this button, enemies hp will decrease faster.
If you think the enemy is too strong, you can also escape the battle.
This is your magic ! Don't forget you need MP to use them. For example, you can use 'Restore' to cure your characters.
This is the main menu. You can buy new items at the shop, handle your inventory, save your party, etc.
Your are actually into this zone. There is a hidden boss in each zones. Find it and kill it to go next zone !
Each time the game is updated, you can check the new features by clicking here.
If you want to report a bug, or ask for features that can make this game more fun, go there.
Well, that's all ! Thanks for your attention ! Good luck and have fun ;)
